description: Teaches you how to summon this three-person mount with vendors. Excellent for those long journies up the summit of Mount Neverest. Be the envy of your friends.
name: Reins of the Grand Expedition Yak

spell.name: Grand Expedition Yak
spell.description: Calls forth the Grand Expedition Yak, complete with helpful grummles for all your vendor needs.

requiredAbility.name: Journeyman Riding
requiredAbility.description: You can now learn to ride fast ground mounts from your riding trainer.
